profile.name: Roi
profile.title: Swift Assassin Roi
profile.story: He is Cleo's escort and is protecting her at Dominix's request. A former member of a group of assassins, he risked his life and went rogue for some unknown reason. Having lived as an assassin, he rarely shows much respect toward others, but his hardships have made him an experienced and shrewd man who treats those who help him with fairness.

uw.name: Specter's Breath, Redeal
uw.description: When using Normal Attacks or [Rend], has a {0}% chance to apply 1 additional stacks of [Fatal Wound] and deal additional Physical Damage equal to {1}% of Attack Power per [Fatal Wound] stack.
uw.story: The group of assassins known as the Laughing Mask has been the master of the Orvel's underworld for a long time. Only the best assassin of the Laughing Mask is allowed to wield this dreadful pair of daggers. It is said that the wounds inflicted by these daggers never heal, and that their victims inevitably bleed to death. According to the legend, these daggers were made from the scythe of the Grim Reaper.

1.name: Cracked Mask
1.description: Dispels all negative effects from self, and recovers Mana by 200 upon Critical Hit.
1.story: The mask that Roi destroyed when he left the Laughing Mask assassins. Assassins mercilessly aim for their enemy's vital points, and they wear masks to suppress their emotions when they eliminate their targets. Roi faces the split mask, and goes behind his enemies to kill them with his Blade Claws to protect his friends.

2.name: Soma's Hood
2.description: [Curtain of Darkness] increases duration by 3 sec and boosts DMG dealt to Bosses by {2}%.
2.story:
A dangerous hood made with the secret method of the Laughing Mask. 
It was made with the legendary soma that is said to provide endless vitality and the secret of the Laughing Mask. 
Soma's hood increases the morale of an assassin inside the dark curtain, increasing their ATK, and granting dexterity, maximizing P. Dodge.

3.name: Shadow Blade
3.description: [Blade Claw] Reduces Cooldown by {1} sec and increases DMG by {2}%.
3.story:
A bagh nakh in the shape of a beast's claw.
It's a concealed weapon made with a Damascus blade, used by the assassins from the east, to maximize the effect of Shadow Blade. Forged with heat and blood, Shadow Blade is known as a cursed weapon lusting for blood. Most people, with the exception of skilled assassins, keep away from it.

4.name: Specter's Ring
4.description: increases DMG by 20% and applies 1 stack of  to the target on Crit.
4.story:
A ring to commemorate Roy's completion of mastering a new skill.
Roy crafted this ring to celebrate for mastering his new Hacking techniques without relying on the techniques of the Laughing Masks. 
Engraved on the ring is an image of Specter Redeal, which serves as a purpose to overcome the past and remind him of his mistakes.
